content: more times then round 1 for 1 4 6 7 times there are 11 11 13 15 sts on each needle 22 22 26 30 sts in total break the yarn leaving an approx 40 cm / 16 tail graft toe sts together using kitchener stitch finish weave in ends wet block to measurements repeat for second sock i would love to see all your finished #cratesocks on instagram and ravelry please email me if you find any issues with the pattern instagram @knitsbylois | ravelry knitsbylois check out my tech editing services at knitsbylois com knitsbylois@gmail com crate socks pattern version 1 0 | copyright © knitsbylois 2025 this pattern is for personal and non-commercial use only do not sell reproduce distribute or use for ai training page 8
